actions.name: AbortMultipartUpload
actions.description: Grants permission to abort a multipart upload identified by the upload ID

actions.name: AbortVaultLock
actions.description: Grants permission to abort the vault locking process if the vault lock is not in the Locked state

actions.name: AddTagsToVault
actions.description: Grants permission to add the specified tags to a vault

actions.name: CompleteMultipartUpload
actions.description: Grants permission to complete a multipart upload process

actions.name: CompleteVaultLock
actions.description: Grants permission to complete the vault locking process

actions.name: CreateVault
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new vault with the specified name

actions.name: DeleteArchive
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an archive from a vault

actions.name: DeleteVault
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a vault

actions.name: DeleteVaultAccessPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the access policy associated with the specified vault

actions.name: DeleteVaultNotifications
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the notification configuration set for a vault

actions.name: DescribeJob
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about a job previously initiated

actions.name: DescribeVault
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about a vault

actions.name: GetDataRetrievalPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to get the data retrieval policy

actions.name: GetJobOutput
actions.description: Grants permission to download the output of the job specified

actions.name: GetVaultAccessPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the access-policy subresource set on the vault

actions.name: GetVaultLock
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve attributes from the lock-policy subresource set on the specified vault

actions.name: GetVaultNotifications
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the notification-configuration subresource set on the vault

actions.name: InitiateJob
actions.description: Grants permission to initiate a job of the specified type

actions.name: InitiateMultipartUpload
actions.description: Grants permission to initiate a multipart upload

actions.name: InitiateVaultLock
actions.description: Grants permission to initiate the vault locking process

actions.name: ListJobs
actions.description: Grants permission to list jobs for a vault that are in-progress and jobs that have recently finished

actions.name: ListMultipartUploads
actions.description: Grants permission to list in-progress multipart uploads for the specified vault

actions.name: ListParts
actions.description: Grants permission to list the parts of an archive that have been uploaded in a specific multipart upload

actions.name: ListProvisionedCapacity
actions.description: Grants permission to list the provisioned capacity for the specified AWS account

actions.name: ListTagsForVault
actions.description: Grants permission to list all the tags attached to a vault

actions.name: ListVaults
actions.description: Grants permission to list all vaults

actions.name: PurchaseProvisionedCapacity
actions.description: Grants permission to purchases a provisioned capacity unit for an AWS account

actions.name: RemoveTagsFromVault
actions.description: Grants permission to remove one or more tags from the set of tags attached to a vault

actions.name: SetDataRetrievalPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to set and then enacts a data retrieval policy in the region specified in the PUT request

actions.name: SetVaultAccessPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to configure an access policy for a vault; will overwrite an existing policy

actions.name: SetVaultNotifications
actions.description: Grants permission to configure vault notifications

actions.name: UploadArchive
actions.description: Grants permission to upload an archive to a vault

actions.name: UploadMultipartPart
actions.description: Grants permission to upload a part of an archive
